DOC.brief_summary: Comparison of blood pressure lowering effect between Fimasartan and Losartan in the hypertensive patient during night and early morning time
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Blood Pressure Lowering Effect Between Fimasartan and Losartan
DOC.criteria: Subject don't have Antihypertensive drug or who stop Antihypertensive drug during 2 weeks Office BP: over siSBP 140mmHg or si DBP 90mmHg 24hr ABPM: SBP 130mmHg or DBP 80mmHg (24 hour Average) Pregnant, trying to become pregnant or breast feeding Subject has Secondary Hypertension White coat Blood Pressure (Normal result of 24 hour ABPM)
